<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sn_contingent_mgmt_req_worker_map</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Make search based on Worker name</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    // Add your code here
    if (current.operation() == "query" && current.name == "contract_worker") {
        // Create a new GlideRecord for sn_contingent_mgmt_contract_worker table
        var contractWorkerGR = new GlideRecord('sn_contingent_mgmt_contract_worker');

        // Add a condition to the query based on the worker_name field
        contractWorkerGR.addQuery('worker_name', current.getValue('contract_worker.worker_name'));

        // Set the query on the reference field
        current.addEncodedQuery(contractWorkerGR.getEncodedQuery());
    }

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-12 06:25:22</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>becdd1b79327b51098002763b189180e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Make search based on Worker name</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Contingent Mgmt Application" source="sn_contingent_mgmt">a573ef1c9313f11098002763b18918b2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Contingent Mgmt Application">a573ef1c9313f11098002763b18918b2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_becdd1b79327b51098002763b189180e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-12 06:25:22</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=becdd1b79327b51098002763b189180e"/></record_update>
